DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study are to investigate the functional connectivity of motor network in patients of stroke and investigate the mechanism of brain plasticity for recovery after stroke.
DOC.brief_title: fMRI Study of Brain Neural Network and Plasticity After Stroke
DOC.criteria: 1steverstroke whose corticospinal tract was injured less than 1 month after stroke onset Claustrophobia who use cardiac pacemaker intracranial metal uncontrolled hypertension or hypotension
DOC.keyword: Brain motor network, Plasticity, functional MRI, Stroke
